forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. West wind 7 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
A bright, gentle morning embraces Downtown San Francisco as the sun climbs higher, casting a serene light across the city. Currently hovering around 65 degrees, the crisp air carries a refreshing hint of a westward breeze, inviting residents to step outside and drink in the atmosphere. The marine layer, typically a playful partner of the coastal weather, seems momentarily subdued, allowing a clearer view of landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge and the rising skyline, where the silhouettes of buildings stretch upward against the soft blue canvas of the sky. 

As the day unfolds, the warmth will linger pleasantly, and even as the temperature dips towards evening, the sky will transition gracefully to a partly cloudy night, promising a comfortable low around 54. Dressing in layers seems wise; a light jacket or cardigan will serve well for the afternoon stroll, while a simple long sleeve will keep any chill at bay later. With the weather inviting, today beckons for a simple walk along the waterfront, perhaps a stop at a local café, or simply a quiet moment spent people-watching in one of the many parks that form a tapestry throughout the city.
